title: Installation issue: bohrium
body:
[jw@cn05 jw]$ spack/bin/spack install bohrium
==> Error: Conflicts in concretized spec "bohrium@0.9.1%gcc@8.3.1+blas+cbridge+cuda~ipo+lapack+node+opencl+opencv+openmp~proxy+python build_type=RelWithDebInfo cuda_arch=none arch=linux-centos8-a64fx/t7iycwy"
List of matching conflicts for spec:

    opencv@4.5.0%gcc@8.3.1~calib3d~contrib+core+cuda~cudacodec~dnn~eigen~fast-math~features2d~flann~gtk~highgui~imgcodecs+imgproc~ipo~ipp~ipp_iw~jasper~java~jpeg~lapack~ml~opencl~opencl_svm~openclamdblas~openclamdfft+openmp~png~powerpc~pthreads_pf~python~qt+shared~stitching~superres~tiff~ts~video~videoio~videostab~vsx~vtk~zlib build_type=RelWithDebInfo cuda_arch=none arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
        ^cmake@3.19.2%gcc@8.3.1~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
            ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@8.3.1~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^pkgconf@1.7.3%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
            ^openssl@1.1.1i%gcc@8.3.1+systemcerts arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^perl@5.32.0%gcc@8.3.1+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                        ^readline@8.0%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@8.3.1+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
        ^cuda@11.2.0%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
            ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@8.3.1~python arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@8.3.1~pic arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
        ^hdf5@1.10.7%gcc@8.3.1~cxx~debug~fortran~hl~java+mpi+pic+shared~szip~threadsafe api=none arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
            ^openmpi@4.0.5%gcc@8.3.1~atomics~cuda~cxx~cxx_exceptions+gpfs~java~legacylaunchers~lustre~memchecker~pmi~singularity~sqlite3+static~thread_multiple+vt+wrapper-rpath fabrics=none schedulers=none arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^hwloc@2.4.0%gcc@8.3.1~cairo~cuda~gl~libudev+libxml2~netloc~nvml+pci+shared arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^libpciaccess@0.16%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                        ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                            ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@8.3.1+sigsegv patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c299f09828d793b853c8 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                                ^libsigsegv@2.12%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                        ^util-macros@1.19.1%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^libevent@2.1.12%gcc@8.3.1+openssl arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                ^numactl@2.0.14%gcc@8.3.1 patches=4e1d78cbbb85de625bad28705e748856033eaafab92a66dffd383a3d7e00cc94 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx
                    ^automake@1.16.3%gcc@8.3.1 arch=linux-centos8-a64fx

1. "^cuda" conflicts with "opencv~contrib" [cuda support requires +contrib]

[jw@cn05 jw]$ spack/bin/spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-948-9d1d37c432
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-a64fx
* **Concretizer:** original
[jw@cn05 jw]$
